trans-unit.source: By default, today's date is selected, and the user can select a date using both mouse and keyboard. The currently selected date can be retrieved using the selectedDate() function. It is possible to constrain the user selection to a given date range by setting the minimumDate and maximumDate properties. Alternatively, both properties can be set in one go using the setDateRange() convenience slot. Set the selectionMode property to NoSelection to prohibit the user from selecting at all. Note that a date also can be selected programmatically using the setSelectedDate() slot.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将选择今天的日期，并且用户可以使用鼠标和键盘选择日期。可以使用selectedDate（）函数检索当前选择的日期。通过设置minimumDate和maximumDate属性，可以将用户选择限制在给定的日期范围内。另外，也可以使用setDateRange（）便捷插槽一次性设置两个属性。将selectionMode属性设置为NoSelection以完全禁止用户选择。请注意，还可以使用setSelectedDate（）插槽以编程方式选择日期。

trans-unit.source: By default, transitions run in parallel and are applied to all state changes if the from and to states have not been set. In this situation, the transition is automatically applied when a state change is reversed, and it is not necessary to set this property to reverse the transition.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果未设置from和to状态，则转换并行运行，并应用于所有状态更改。在这种情况下，当状态更改被撤消时，过渡将自动应用，并且无需设置此属性来撤消过渡。

trans-unit.source: By default, when reading numbers from a stream of text, QTextStream will automatically detect the number's base representation. For example, if the number starts with "0x", it is assumed to be in hexadecimal form. If it starts with the digits 1-9, it is assumed to be in decimal form, and so on. You can set the integer base, thereby disabling the automatic detection, by calling setIntegerBase(). Example:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当从文本流中读取数字时，QTextStream将自动检测数字的基本表示形式。例如，如果数字以“ 0x”开头，则假定为十六进制形式。如果以数字1-9开头，则假定为十进制形式，依此类推。您可以通过调用setIntegerBase（）来设置整数基数，从而禁用自动检测。例：

trans-unit.source: By design, QPromise is a move-only object. This behavior helps to ensure that whenever the promise is destroyed, the associated future object is notified and will not wait forever for the results to become available. However, this is inconvenient if one wants to use the same promise to report results from different threads. There is no specific way to do that at the moment, but known mechanisms exist, such as the use of smart pointers or raw pointers/references. QSharedPointer is a good default choice if you want to copy your promise and use it in multiple places simultaneously. Raw pointers or references are, in a sense, easier, and probably perform better (since there is no need to do a resource management) but may lead to dangling.
trans-unit.target: 根据设计，QPromise是仅移动对象。此行为有助于确保每当销毁诺言时，都会通知相关的将来对象，并且不会永远等待结果变为可用。但是，如果要使用相同的诺言来报告来自不同线程的结果，这将很不方便。目前尚无特定方法可以执行此操作，但是存在已知的机制，例如使用智能指针或原始指针/引用。如果您要复制承诺并同时在多个地方使用它，则QSharedPointer是一个很好的默认选择。从某种意义上说，原始指针或引用更容易，并且可能会表现更好（因为不需要进行资源管理），但可能导致悬空。

trans-unit.source: By disabling clearing of the color buffer, it is possible to render OpengGL content under the scene graph.
trans-unit.target: 通过禁止清除颜色缓冲区,可以在场景图下渲染OpengGL内容。

trans-unit.source: By instantiating subclasses of QWinMime that provide conversions between Windows Clipboard and MIME formats, you can convert proprietary clipboard formats to MIME formats.
trans-unit.target: 通过实例化QWinMime的子类,提供Windows剪贴板和MIME格式之间的转换,你可以将专有的剪贴板格式转换为MIME格式。

trans-unit.source: By itself a Qt3DCore::QEntity is an empty shell. The behavior of a Qt3DCore::QEntity object is defined by the Qt3DCore::QComponent objects it references. Each Qt3D backend aspect will be able to interpret and process an Entity by recognizing which components it is made up of. One aspect may decide to only process entities composed of a single Qt3DCore::QTransform component whilst another may focus on Qt3DInput::QMouseHandler.
trans-unit.target: Qt3DCore :: QEntity本身就是一个空壳。一的行为Qt3DCore :: QEntity对象由定义Qt3DCore :: QComponent对象引用它。每个Qt3D后端方面都将能够通过识别实体由哪些组件来解释和处理该实体。一个方面可以决定仅处理由单个Qt3DCore :: QTransform组件组成的实体，而另一个方面可以专注于Qt3DInput :: QMouseHandler。

trans-unit.source: By itself a Entity is an empty shell. The behavior of a Entity object is defined by the Component3D objects it references. Each Qt3D backend aspect will be able to interpret and process an Entity by recognizing which components it is made up of. One aspect may decide to only process entities composed of a single Transform component whilst another may focus on MouseHandler.
trans-unit.target: 实体本身就是一个空壳。实体对象的行为由其引用的Component3D对象定义。每个Qt3D后端方面都将能够通过识别实体由哪些组件来解释和处理该实体。一个方面可能决定仅处理由单个Transform组件组成的实体，而另一个方面可能会专注于MouseHandler。

trans-unit.source: By leveraging the new view classes, one can achieve a lot of performance boost in many use cases. However, it is important to know that there might be some caveats. Therefore it is important to remember:
trans-unit.target: 通过利用新的视图类,可以在许多用例中实现大量的性能提升。然而,重要的是要知道,可能有一些注意事项。因此,重要的是要记住。

trans-unit.source: By making an item a child of another, you can achieve the most essential feature of item grouping: the items will move together, and all transformations are propagated from parent to child.
trans-unit.target: 通过使一个项目成为另一个项目的子项目,你可以实现项目分组最基本的功能:项目会一起移动,所有的转换都会从父项目传播到子项目。

trans-unit.source: By nature, a View3D object, representing a 3D viewport in the 2D scene, can be easily combined with Qt Quick items, such as, Rectangle, Image, Text, around, below, or above the View3D item, which itself is a Qt Quick Item.
trans-unit.target: 从本质上讲，代表2D场景中3D视口的View3D对象可以很容易地与Qt Quick项目结合在一起，例如Rectangle，Image，Text，位于View3D项目周围，​​下方或上方的本身就是Qt Quick项目。

trans-unit.source: By partitioning an application into simple, modular components, each contained in a single QML file, you can achieve faster application startup time and better control over memory usage, and reduce the number of active-but-invisible elements in your application.
trans-unit.target: 通过将应用程序分割成简单的、模块化的组件,每个组件都包含在一个QML文件中,你可以实现更快的应用程序启动时间,更好地控制内存使用,并减少应用程序中活动但不可见的元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: By pre-multiplying the projection matrix with this matrix, applications can continue to assume that Y is pointing upwards, and can set minDepth and maxDepth in the viewport to 0 and 1, respectively, without having to do any further corrections to the vertex Z positions. Geometry from OpenGL applications can then be used as-is, assuming a rasterization state matching the OpenGL culling and front face settings.
trans-unit.target: 通过用该矩阵对投影矩阵进行预乘,应用程序可以继续假设Y指向上方,并可以将视口中的minDepth和maxDepth分别设置为0和1,而无需对顶点Z位置进行任何进一步的修正。然后,来自OpenGL应用的几何体可以按原样使用,假设栅格化状态与OpenGL裁剪和前脸设置相匹配。

trans-unit.target: 通过重新实现updateState（），您可以跟踪动画的状态变化，这对于不受时间驱动的动画特别有用。

trans-unit.target: 通过选择合适的父对象,往往可以在合适的时刻对模块的数据进行清理。

trans-unit.source: By setting the "window" or viewport rectangle, you perform a linear transformation of the coordinates. Note that each corner of the "window" maps to the corresponding corner of the viewport, and vice versa. For that reason it normally is a good idea to let the viewport and "window" maintain the same aspect ratio to prevent deformation:
trans-unit.target: 通过设置 "窗口 "或视口矩形,您可以执行坐标的线性变换。请注意,"窗口 "的每个角都会映射到视口的对应角,反之亦然。因此,通常最好让视口和 "窗口 "保持相同的纵横比,以防止变形。

trans-unit.source: By setting the canvasSize, tileSize and canvasWindow, the Canvas item can act as a large virtual canvas with many separately rendered tile rectangles. Only those tiles within the current canvas window are painted by the Canvas render engine.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置canvasSize、tileSize和canvasWindow,Canvas项可以作为一个大的虚拟画布,上面有许多单独渲染的瓷砖矩形。只有当前画布窗口内的瓷砖才会被Canvas渲染引擎绘制。

trans-unit.source: By setting the size policy on an anchor you can configure how the anchor can resize itself from its preferred spacing. For instance, if the anchor has the size policy QSizePolicy::Minimum, the spacing is the minimum size of the anchor. However, its size can grow up to the anchors maximum size. If the default size policy is QSizePolicy::Fixed, the anchor can neither grow or shrink, which means that the only size the anchor can have is the spacing. QSizePolicy::Fixed is the default size policy. QGraphicsAnchor always has a minimum spacing of 0 and a very large maximum spacing.
trans-unit.target: 通过在锚点上设置大小策略，您可以配置锚点如何根据其首选间距调整自身大小。例如，如果锚点具有大小策略QSizePolicy :: Minimum，则间距是锚点的最小大小。但是，其大小可以增长到锚点的最大大小。如果默认大小策略是QSizePolicy :: Fixed，则锚点既不能增长也不能缩小，这意味着锚点只能具有间距。QSizePolicy :: Fixed是默认大小策略。QGraphicsAnchor的最小间距始终为0，最大间距非常大。

trans-unit.source: By setting the value to 2, 4, etc. multisampled rendering can be requested for a part of the scene without enabling multisampling for the entire scene. This way multisampling is applied only to a given subtree, which can lead to significant performance gains since multisampling is not applied to other parts of the scene.
trans-unit.target: 通过将该值设置为2、4等,可以要求对场景的一部分进行多采样渲染,而不对整个场景启用多采样。这样多采样只应用于一个给定的子树,由于多采样不应用于场景的其他部分,因此可以显著提高性能。

trans-unit.target: 通过指定基本名称和扩展名，Qt3DExtras :: QSkyboxEntity将负责构建TextureCubeMap以在运行时呈现。源目录中的图像应与以下模式匹配：基本名称+ *“ _posx | _posy | _posz | _negx | _negy | _negz” +扩展名

trans-unit.source: By subclassing QIODevice, you can provide the same interface to your own I/O devices. Subclasses of QIODevice are only required to implement the protected readData() and writeData() functions. QIODevice uses these functions to implement all its convenience functions, such as getChar(), readLine() and write(). QIODevice also handles access control for you, so you can safely assume that the device is opened in write mode if writeData() is called.
trans-unit.target: 通过子类化QIODevice，您可以为自己的I / O设备提供相同的接口。QIODevice的子类仅需要实现受保护的readData（）和writeData（）函数。QIODevice使用这些功能来实现其所有便利功能，例如getChar（），readLine（）和write（）。QIODevice还会为您处理访问控制，因此，如果调用writeData（），则可以安全地假定设备以写模式打开。

Subclasses of QIODevice are only required to implement the protected readData() and writeData() functions. QIODevice uses these functions to implement all its convenience functions, such as getChar(), readLine() and write(). QIODevice also handles access control for you, so you can safely assume that the device is opened in write mode if writeData() is called.

trans-unit.source: By using setComponents() you may constrain the search results to documents that belong only to components specified on the given list. By using setVersions() you may constrain the search results to documents that belong only to versions specified on the given list.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用setComponents（），您可以将搜索结果限制为仅属于给定列表中指定的组件的文档。通过使用setVersions（），您可以将搜索结果限制为仅属于给定列表中指定版本的文档。

trans-unit.source: By using LITERAL_HASH in this way, the # character can be used to construct a URL for the message() function to print to the console.
trans-unit.target: 通过以这种方式使用 LITERAL_HASH ， # 字符可用于构造URL，以供 message() 函数打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: By using file selectors, style-specific tweaks can be applied without creating a hard dependency to a style. From the available file variants, only the selected QML file is loaded by the QML engine. Each file variant can assume the context, that is, a specific style. This typically leads to some code duplication, but on the other hand, cuts the aforementioned hard dependency to the style, and leads to simpler and more efficient QML code.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用文件选择器,风格特定的调整可以被应用,而不需要创建一个硬的依赖风格。在可用的文件变体中,QML引擎只加载所选的QML文件。每个文件变体都可以承担上下文,也就是特定的样式。这通常会导致一些代码重复,但另一方面,削减了上述对样式的硬依赖,并导致更简单和更有效的QML代码。

trans-unit.source: By using file selectors, style-specific tweaks can be applied without creating a hard dependency to a style. From the available file variants, only the selected QML file is loaded by the QML engine. Each file variant can assume the context, that is, a specific style. This typically leads to some code duplication, but on the other hand, cuts the aforementioned hard dependency to the style, and leads to simpler and more efficient QML code. The same technique is used to implement the Qt Quick Controls styles.

trans-unit.source: C++ and Java exceptions are a valid analogy for D-Bus errors: instead of returning normally with a return value, remote applications and the bus may decide to throw an error condition. However, the Qt D-Bus implementation does not use the C++ exception-throwing mechanism, so you will receive QDBusErrors in the return reply (see QDBusReply::error()).
trans-unit.target: C ++和Java异常是D-Bus错误的有效类比：远程应用程序和总线可能决定抛出错误条件，而不是正常返回返回值。但是，Qt D-Bus实现不使用C ++异常抛出机制，因此您将在返回答复中收到QDBusErrors（请参阅QDBusReply :: error（））。

trans-unit.target: C++和QML

trans-unit.source: C++ classes are often reentrant, simply because they only access their own member data. Any thread can call a member function on an instance of a reentrant class, as long as no other thread can call a member function on the
trans-unit.target: C++类通常是重入的,只是因为它们只访问自己的成员数据。任何线程都可以在一个重入类的实例上调用成员函数,只要没有其他线程可以在该类的

trans-unit.source: C++ data model, as described in the QScxmlCppDataModel documentation
trans-unit.target: C ++数据模型，如QScxmlCppDataModel文档中所述

trans-unit.source: C++ is a standarized, powerful and elaborate general-purpose language. It's the only language that is exploited on such a wide range of software projects, spanning every kind of application from entire operating systems, database servers and high end graphics applications to common desktop applications. One of the keys to C++'s success is its scalable language design that focuses on maximum performance and minimal memory consumption whilst still maintaining ANSI C compatibility.
trans-unit.target: C++是一种标准化的、功能强大的、复杂的通用语言。它是唯一一门被广泛用于软件项目的语言,涵盖了从整个操作系统、数据库服务器、高端图形应用到普通桌面应用的各种应用。C++成功的关键之一是其可扩展的语言设计,它注重最大的性能和最小的内存消耗,同时仍然保持ANSI C的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: C++ modules or members of the module with a specified name.
trans-unit.target: C++模块或指定名称的模块成员。

trans-unit.source: C++ plugin writers and application developers may register types defined in C++ through API provided by the Qt QML module. There are various registration functions which each allow different use-cases to be fulfilled. For more information about those registration functions, and the specifics of exposing custom C++ types to QML, see the documentation regarding Defining QML Types from C++.
trans-unit.target: C ++插件编写者和应用程序开发人员可以通过Qt QML模块提供的API注册用C ++定义的类型。有各种注册功能，每个功能都可以满足不同的用例。有关这些注册功能以及将自定义C ++类型暴露于QML的细节的更多信息，请参见有关从C ++定义QML类型的文档。

trans-unit.source: C++ plugin writers and application developers may register types defined in C++ through API provided by the Qt QML module. There are various registration functions which each allow different use-cases to be fulfilled. For more information about those registration functions, and the specifics of exposing custom C++ types to QML, see the documentation regarding Defining QML Types from C++.
trans-unit.target: C ++插件编写者和应用程序开发人员可以通过Qt QML模块提供的API注册用C ++定义的类型。有多种注册功能，每种注册功能都可以满足不同的用例。有关这些注册功能的详细信息，以及将自定义C ++类型公开给QML的细节，请参阅有关从C ++定义QML类型的文档。

trans-unit.source: C++ signals and methods with enumeration-type parameters can be used from QML provided that the enumeration and the signal or method are both declared within the same class, or that the enumeration value is one of those declared in the Qt Namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果枚举与信号或方法都在同一类中声明，或者枚举值是在Qt命名空间中声明的值之一，则可以从QML中使用带有枚举类型参数的C ++信号和方法。

trans-unit.source: C++ with the moc essentially gives us the flexibility of Objective-C or of a Java Runtime Environment, while maintaining C++'s unique performance and scalability advantages. It is what makes Qt the flexible and comfortable tool we have today.
trans-unit.target: 具有 moc C ++ 本质上为我们提供了Objective-C或Java运行时环境的灵活性，同时保持了C ++独特的性能和可伸缩性优势。这就是使Qt成为我们今天拥有的灵活舒适的工具的原因。

trans-unit.source: CBOR Type
trans-unit.target: CBOR类型

trans-unit.source: CBOR diagnostic notation is specified by section 6 of RFC 7049. It is a text representation of the CBOR stream and it is very similar to JSON, but it supports the CBOR types not found in JSON. The extended format enabled by the ExtendedFormat flag is currently in some IETF drafts and its format is subject to change.
trans-unit.target: CBOR诊断符号由RFC 7049 的第6节指定。它是CBOR流的文本表示形式，与JSON非常相似，但是它支持JSON中找不到的CBOR类型。当前，某些IETF草案中已通过ExtendedFormat标志启用的扩展格式，其格式可能会发生更改。

trans-unit.source: CBOR floating point values are distinct from integer values. Therefore, QCborValue objects with integers will compare differently to QCborValue objects containing floating-point, even if the values contained in the objects are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: CBOR浮点值不同于整数值。因此，具有整数的QCborValue对象将与包含浮点的QCborValue对象进行比较，即使这些对象中包含的值相等。

trans-unit.source: CBOR floating point values are distinct from integer values. Therefore, QCborValue objects with integers will compare differently to QCborValue objects containing floating-point, even if the values contained in the objects are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: CBOR浮点值与整数值不同。因此,包含整数的QCborValue对象与包含浮点的QCborValue对象的比较会有所不同,即使对象中包含的值是相等的。

trans-unit.source: CBOR has three groups of built-in types:
trans-unit.target: CBOR有三组内置类型。

trans-unit.source: CBOR integer values are distinct from floating point values. Therefore, QCborValue objects with integers will compare differently to QCborValue objects containing floating-point, even if the values contained in the objects are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: CBOR整数值与浮点值不同。因此，具有整数的QCborValue对象将与包含浮点的QCborValue对象进行比较，即使这些对象中包含的值相等。

trans-unit.source: CBOR integer values are distinct from floating point values. Therefore, QCborValue objects with integers will compare differently to QCborValue objects containing floating-point, even if the values contained in the objects are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: CBOR整数值与浮点值是不同的。因此,含有整数的QCborValue对象将与含有浮点的QCborValue对象进行不同的比较,即使对象中包含的值是相等的。

trans-unit.source: CBOR null values are used to indicate optional values that were not provided. They are distinct from undefined values, in that null values are usually not the result of an earlier error or problem.
trans-unit.target: CBOR空值用于表示未提供的可选值。它们不同于未定义的值,因为空值通常不是早期错误或问题的结果。

trans-unit.source: CBOR recommends using integer keys, since they occupy less space and are simpler to encode and decode.
trans-unit.target: CBOR建议使用整数钥匙,因为它们占用的空间较小,编码和解码也比较简单。

trans-unit.source: CBOR represents extended types by associating a number (the tag) with a stored representation. This function returns that number. To retrieve the representation, use taggedValue().
trans-unit.target: CBOR通过将数字（标签）与存储的表示形式相关联来表示扩展类型。此函数返回该数字。要检索表示形式，请使用aggedValue（）。

trans-unit.source: CBOR represents extended types by associating a number (the tag) with a stored representation. This function returns that representation. To retrieve the tag, use tag().
trans-unit.target: CBOR通过将数字（标签）与存储的表示形式相关联来表示扩展类型。此函数返回该表示形式。要检索标签，请使用标签（）。

trans-unit.source: CBOR simple types are types that do not carry extra value. There are 255 possibilities, but there are currently only four values that have defined meaning. Code is not expected to cope with unknown simple types and may simply discard the stream as invalid if it finds an unknown one.
trans-unit.target: CBOR简单类型是不携带额外值的类型。有255种可能性,但目前只有4种值具有定义的意义。代码不应该应对未知的简单类型,如果发现未知的类型,可能会简单地将流作为无效类型丢弃。

trans-unit.source: CBOR simple types are types that do not have any associated value, like C++'s std::nullptr_t type, whose only possible value is nullptr.
trans-unit.target: CBOR简单类型是没有任何关联值的类型，例如C ++的 std::nullptr_t 类型，其唯一可能的值为 nullptr 。

trans-unit.source: CBOR string, map or array is too big and cannot be parsed by Qt (internal limitation, but the error is not recoverable).
trans-unit.target: CBOR 字符串、映射或数组太大,Qt无法解析(内部限制,但错误无法恢复)。

trans-unit.source: CBOR support
trans-unit.target: CBOR支持

trans-unit.source: CBOR supports additional simple types that, like Null and Undefined, carry no other value. They are called interchangeably "Simple Types" and "Simple Values". CBOR encodes booleans as two distinct types (one for true and one for false), but QCborValue has a convenience API for them.
trans-unit.target: CBOR支持其他简单类型，例如Null和Undefined，不包含其他值。它们可互换地称为“简单类型”和“简单值”。CBOR将布尔值编码为两种不同的类型（一种表示 true ，一种表示 false ），但是QCborValue具有一个便捷的API。

trans-unit.source: CBOR supports additional simple types that, like Null and Undefined, carry no other value. They are called interchangeably "Simple Types" and "Simple Values". CBOR encodes booleans as two distinct types (one for true and one for false), but QCborValue has a convenience API for them.
trans-unit.target: CBOR支持其他简单类型，例如Null和Undefined，不包含其他值。它们可互换地称为“简单类型”和“简单值”。CBOR将布尔值编码为两种不同的类型（一种表示 true ，一种表示 false ），但是QCborValue为它们提供了一种便捷的API。

trans-unit.source: CBOR tags are 64-bit numbers that are attached to generic CBOR types to provide further semantic meaning. QCborTag may be constructed from an enumeration found in QCborKnownTags or directly by providing the numeric representation.
trans-unit.target: CBOR标记是附加到通用CBOR类型以提供进一步语义的64位数字。QCborTag可以从QCborKnownTags中找到的枚举构造，也可以直接通过提供数字表示来构造。

trans-unit.source: CBOR type
trans-unit.target: CBOR型

trans-unit.source: CBOR undefined values are used to indicate missing information, usually as a result of a previous operation that did not complete as expected. They are also used by the QCborArray and QCborMap API to indicate the searched item was not found.
trans-unit.target: CBOR未定义值通常用于指示缺少的信息，通常是由于先前的操作未按预期完成。QCborArray和QCborMap API 也使用它们来指示未找到搜索到的项目。

trans-unit.source: CDATA sections are used to escape blocks of text containing characters that would otherwise be regarded as markup. The only delimiter that is recognized in a CDATA section is the "]]&gt;" string that terminates the CDATA section. CDATA sections cannot be nested. Their primary purpose is for including material such as XML fragments, without needing to escape all the delimiters.
trans-unit.target: CDATA节用于转义包含可能被视为标记的字符的文本块。CDATA节中唯一可识别的定界符是“]]＆gt;” 终止CDATA节的字符串。CDATA节不能嵌套。它们的主要目的是包含诸如XML片段之类的资料，而无需转义所有定界符。

trans-unit.source: CMYK
trans-unit.target: CMYK

trans-unit.source: CMYK has four components, all in the range 0-255: cyan (C), magenta (M), yellow (Y) and black (K). Cyan, magenta and yellow are called subtractive colors; the CMYK color model creates color by starting with a white surface and then subtracting color by applying the appropriate components. While combining cyan, magenta and yellow gives the color black, subtracting one or more will yield any other color. When combined in various percentages, these three colors can create the entire spectrum of colors.
trans-unit.target: CMYK有四种成分,都在0-255的范围内:青色(C)、品红(M)、黄色(Y)和黑色(K)。青色、品红和黄色被称为减色,CMYK色彩模型通过从白色表面开始,然后通过应用适当的组件减去颜色来创建色彩。虽然将青色、品红和黄色结合起来可以得到黑色,但减去一种或多种会得到任何其他颜色。当以不同的百分比组合时,这三种颜色可以创建整个光谱的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Caching and Performance
trans-unit.target: 缓存和性能

trans-unit.source: Caching can speed up rendering if your item spends a significant time redrawing itself. In some cases the cache can also slow down rendering, in particular when the item spends less time redrawing than QGraphicsItem spends redrawing from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的项目花费大量时间重新绘制自身，则缓存可以加快渲染速度。在某些情况下，缓存还会降低渲染速度，特别是当项目花费的重绘时间少于QGraphicsItem从缓存中重绘的时间时。

trans-unit.source: Caching frames can be useful when the underlying animation format handler that QMovie relies on to decode the animation data does not support jumping to particular frames in the animation, or even "rewinding" the animation to the beginning (for looping). Furthermore, if the image data comes from a sequential device, it is not possible for the underlying animation handler to seek back to frames whose data has already been read (making looping altogether impossible).
trans-unit.target: 当QMovie用来解码动画数据的基础动画格式处理程序不支持跳转到动画中的特定帧，甚至不支持将动画“倒回”到开始（用于循环）时，缓存帧可能会很有用。此外，如果图像数据来自顺序设备，则底层的动画处理程序将无法返回到其数据已被读取的帧（完全使循环成为不可能）。

trans-unit.source: Caching is enabled at the paint device level, in device coordinates. This mode is for items that can move, but are not rotated, scaled or sheared. If the item is transformed directly or indirectly, the cache will be regenerated automatically. Unlike ItemCoordinateCacheMode, DeviceCoordinateCache always renders at maximum quality.
trans-unit.target: 缓存是在设备坐标的绘图设备级别启用的。该模式适用于可以移动,但不旋转、不缩放或不剪切的项目。如果项目被直接或间接变换,缓存将被自动重新生成。与ItemCoordinateCacheMode不同,DeviceCoordinateCache总是以最大质量渲染。

trans-unit.source: Caching is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 缓存是默认启用的。

trans-unit.source: Caching is enabled for the item's logical (local) coordinate system. QGraphicsItem creates an off-screen pixel buffer with a configurable size / resolution that you can pass to QGraphicsItem::setCacheMode(). Rendering quality will typically degrade, depending on the resolution of the cache and the item transformation. The first time the item is redrawn, it will render itself into the cache, and the cache is then reused for every subsequent expose. The cache is also reused as the item is transformed. To adjust the resolution of the cache, you can call setCacheMode() again.
trans-unit.target: 为项目的逻辑（本地）坐标系启用了缓存。QGraphicsItem创建一个具有可配置大小/分辨率的屏幕外像素缓冲区，您可以将其传递给QGraphicsItem :: setCacheMode（）。呈现质量通常会下降，具体取决于缓存的分辨率和项目转换。第一次重画该项目时，它将自身呈现到高速缓存中，然后对于以后的每个暴露都重新使用高速缓存。随着项目的转换，缓存也被重用。要调整缓存的分辨率，可以再次调用setCacheMode（）。

trans-unit.source: Caching is strongly recommended; without it layout will take exponential time.
trans-unit.target: 强烈建议使用缓存,如果不使用缓存,布局将花费指数级的时间。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a 3x3 matrix suitable as the input to blit(). This is used when only a part of the texture is to be used in the blit.

trans-unit.source: Calculates a target transform suitable for blit().
trans-unit.target: 计算适用于blit（）的目标转换。

trans-unit.source: Calculates and returns the bounding rect of all items on the scene. This function works by iterating over all items, and because of this, it can be slow for large scenes.
trans-unit.target: 计算并返回场景中所有项目的边界矩形。这个函数的工作方式是遍历所有项目,因此,对于大场景来说,它可能会很慢。

trans-unit.source: Calculates diffuse sample for the light probe. The return value is 4-component rgba vector.
trans-unit.target: 计算光探针的漫射样本。返回值为4分量rgba向量。

trans-unit.source: Calculates roll, pitch, and yaw Euler angles (in degrees) that corresponds to this quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 计算与该四元数对应的滚动、俯仰和偏航欧拉角(度数)。

trans-unit.source: Calculates specular sample for the light probe. The return value is 4-component rgba vector.
trans-unit.target: 计算光探针的镜面样品。返回值为4分量rgba向量。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the expected data size for
trans-unit.target: 计算以下数据的预期大小

trans-unit.source: Calculates the tangents and bitangents for the imported meshes.
trans-unit.target: 计算导入网格的切线和位切线。

trans-unit.source: Calculating a value per vertex (for example, assuming a single triangle, for the 3 corners of the triangle), and then passing it on to the fragment stage, where for each fragment (for example, every fragment covered by the rasterized triangle) an interpolated value is made accessible. In custom material shader snippets this is made possible by the VARYING keyword. This provides a syntax similar to GLSL 120 and GLSL ES 100, but will work regardless of the graphics API used at run time. The engine will take care of rewriting the varying declaration as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 计算每个顶点的值（例如，假设单个三角形，三角形的三个角），然后将其传递到片段阶段，其中对于每个片段（例如，栅格化三角形覆盖的每个片段），插值可访问。在自定义材质着色器片段中，这可以通过 VARYING 关键字来实现。这提供了类似于GLSL 120和GLSL ES 100的语法，但是不管运行时使用的图形API是什么，都可以使用。引擎将负责适当地重写变化的声明。

trans-unit.source: Calculating gradients can be computationally expensive compared to the use of solid color fills or images. Consider using gradients for static items in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: 与使用纯色填充或图像相比,计算渐变的成本很高。考虑对用户界面中的静态项目使用渐变。

trans-unit.source: Calculating text layouts can be a slow operation. Consider using the PlainText format instead of StyledText wherever possible, as this reduces the amount of work required of the layout engine. If you cannot use PlainText (as you need to embed images, or use tags to specify ranges of characters to have certain formatting (bold, italic, etc) as opposed to the entire text) then you should use StyledText.
trans-unit.target: 计算文本布局可能是一个缓慢的操作。考虑尽可能使用 PlainText 格式而不是 StyledText ，因为这会减少布局引擎所需的工作量。如果您不能使用 PlainText （因为您需要嵌入图像，或使用标签来指定字符范围以具有与整个文本相对的某些格式（粗体，斜体等）），则应使用 StyledText 。

trans-unit.source: Call changePersistentIndex()
trans-unit.target: 呼叫changePersistentIndex（）

trans-unit.source: Call QAbstractTextDocumentLayout::registerHandler() with an instance of your QTextObjectInterface subclass to register your object type.
trans-unit.target: 使用您的QTextObjectInterface子类的实例调用QAbstractTextDocumentLayout :: registerHandler（）以注册您的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: Call QAbstractTextDocumentLayout::registerHandler() with an instance of your QTextObjectInterface subclass to register your object type.
trans-unit.target: 使用您的QTextObjectInterface子类的实例调用QAbstractTextDocumentLayout :: registerHandler（）以注册您的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: Call open() to open the buffer. Then call write() or putChar() to write to the buffer, and read(), readLine(), readAll(), or getChar() to read from it. size() returns the current size of the buffer, and you can seek to arbitrary positions in the buffer by calling seek(). When you are done with accessing the buffer, call close().
trans-unit.target: 调用open（）打开缓冲区。然后调用write（）或putChar（）写入缓冲区，并读取（），readLine（），readAll（）或getChar（）来读取缓冲区。size（）返回缓冲区的当前大小，您可以通过调用seek（）在缓冲区中查找任意位置。完成访问缓冲区后，请调用close（）。

trans-unit.source: Call addData() to add more data to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 调用addData（）添加更多要解析的数据。

trans-unit.source: Call QCommandLineParser::value() if you expect the option to be present only once, and QCommandLineParser::values() if you expect that option to be present multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望该选项仅出现一次，则调用QCommandLineParser :: value（）；如果您希望该选项多次出现，则调用QCommandLineParser :: values（）。

trans-unit.source: Call QPrintPreviewDialog::exec() to show the preview dialog.
trans-unit.target: 调用QPrintPreviewDialog :: exec（）以显示预览对话框。

trans-unit.source: Call exec().
trans-unit.target: 调用exec（）。

trans-unit.source: Call addPath() to watch a particular file or directory. Multiple paths can be added using the addPaths() function. Existing paths can be removed by using the removePath() and removePaths() functions.
trans-unit.target: 调用addPath（）来监视特定的文件或目录。可以使用addPaths（）函数添加多个路径。可以使用removePath（）和removePaths（）函数删除现有路径。

trans-unit.source: Call setWritingSystem() to tell QFontComboBox to show only fonts that support a given writing system, and setFontFilters() to filter out certain types of fonts as e.g. non scalable fonts or monospaced fonts.
trans-unit.target: 调用setWritingSystem（）告诉QFontComboBox仅显示支持给定书写系统的字体，并调用setFontFilters（）过滤掉某些类型的字体，例如不可缩放的字体或等宽字体。

trans-unit.source: Call setWritingSystem() to tell QFontComboBox to show only fonts that support a given writing system, and setFontFilters() to filter out certain types of fonts as e.g. non scalable fonts or monospaced fonts.
trans-unit.target: 调用setWritingSystem（）告诉QFontComboBox仅显示支持给定书写系统的字体，并调用setFontFilters（）过滤掉某些类型的字体，例如不可缩放的字体或等宽字体。

trans-unit.source: Call startUpdates() and stopUpdates() to start and stop regular updates, or requestUpdate() to request a single update. When an update is available, satellitesInViewUpdated() and/or satellitesInUseUpdated() will be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 调用startUpdates（）和stopUpdates（）以启动和停止常规更新，或调用requestUpdate（）以请求单个更新。当有可用更新时，将发出satellitesInViewUpdated（）和/或satellitesInUseUpdated（）。

trans-unit.source: Call key() on the return value to obtain the item's key, and value() to obtain the value.
trans-unit.target: 调用返回值上的key（）获取项目的键，并调用value（）获得该值。

trans-unit.source: Call setDevice() to assign a device to the handler, and setFormat() to assign a format to it. One QImageIOHandler may support more than one image format. canRead() returns true if an image can be read from the device, and read() and write() return true if reading or writing an image was completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 调用setDevice（）将设备分配给处理程序，并调用setFormat（）为其分配格式。一个QImageIOHandler可能支持不止一种图像格式。如果可以从设备读取图像，则canRead（）返回 true ;如果读取或写入图像成功完成，则read（）和write（）返回true。

trans-unit.source: Call setDevice() to assign a device to the handler, and setFormat() to assign a format to it. One QImageIOHandler may support more than one image format. canRead() returns true if an image can be read from the device, and read() and write() return true if reading or writing an image was completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 调用setDevice（）将设备分配给处理程序，并调用setFormat（）为其分配格式。一个QImageIOHandler可能支持不止一种图像格式。如果可以从设备读取图像，则canRead（）返回 true ;如果读取或写入图像成功完成，则read（）和write（）返回true。

trans-unit.source: Call supportedImageFormats() for a list of formats that QImageReader can read. trans-unit.source: Call listen() to have the server start listening for incoming connections on a specified key. The newConnection() signal is then emitted each time a client connects to the server.

trans-unit.source: Call write() to write the document to the device. If the document is successfully written, this function returns true. However, if an error occurs when writing the document, it will return false.
trans-unit.target: 调用write（）将文档写入设备。如果文档已成功写入，则此函数返回 true 。但是，如果在写文档时发生错误，它将返回false。

trans-unit.source: Call maxThreadCount() to query the maximum number of threads to be used. If needed, you can change the limit with setMaxThreadCount(). The default maxThreadCount() is QThread::idealThreadCount(). The activeThreadCount() function returns the number of threads currently doing work.
trans-unit.target: 调用maxThreadCount（）查询要使用的最大线程数。如果需要，可以使用setMaxThreadCount（）更改限制。默认的maxThreadCount（）是QThread :: idealThreadCount（）。该activeThreadCount（）函数返回线程的数量目前正在做的工作。

trans-unit.source: Call isValid() to check if the URL is valid. This can be done at any point during the constructing of a URL. If isValid() returns false, you should clear() the URL before proceeding, or start over by parsing a new URL with setUrl().
trans-unit.target: 调用isValid（）来检查URL是否有效。可以在构建URL期间的任何时候完成此操作。如果isValid（）返回 false ，则应在继续之前清除（）URL，或通过使用setUrl（）解析新的URL重新开始。

trans-unit.source: Call show() to make the rubber band visible; also when the rubber band is not a top-level. Hiding or destroying the widget will make the rubber band disappear. The rubber band can be a Rectangle or a Line (vertical or horizontal), depending on the shape() it was given when constructed.
trans-unit.target: 调用show（）以使橡皮筋可见；当橡皮筋不是顶级的时候 隐藏或破坏小部件将使橡皮筋消失。橡皮筋可以是矩形或直线（垂直或水平），具体取决于构造时给出的形状（）。

trans-unit.source: Call QWidget::setSizePolicy() to specify the space requirements of the widget.
trans-unit.target: 调用QWidget :: setSizePolicy（）来指定小部件的空间要求。

trans-unit.source: Call QWidget::updateGeometry() whenever the size hint, minimum size hint or size policy changes. This will cause a layout recalculation. Multiple consecutive calls to QWidget::updateGeometry() will only cause one layout recalculation.
trans-unit.target: 每当大小提示，最小大小提示或大小策略更改时，调用QWidget :: updateGeometry（）。这将导致布局重新计算。连续调用QWidget :: updateGeometry（）只会导致一次布局重新计算。

trans-unit.source: Call QWidget::winId to enforce a native window (this implies 3).
trans-unit.target: 调用QWidget :: winId强制执行本机窗口（这意味着3）。

trans-unit.target: 调用glDraw*()函数

trans-unit.target: 调用idc工具为COM服务器生成IDL文件

trans-unit.source: Call the restorePurchases() function to begin this process. Granted that the remote store supports it, you will then at some point get transactionReady() for each unlockable item which has previously been purchased by the current user.
trans-unit.target: 调用restorePurchases（）函数开始此过程。如果远程存储支持它，那么您将在某个时候为当前用户先前已购买的每个可解锁物品获取transactionReady（）。

trans-unit.source: Call the beginPath() method to set a new path.
trans-unit.target: 调用beginPath（）方法来设置新路径。

trans-unit.source: Call the moveTo(x, y) method to set your starting position on the canvas at the point (x, y).
trans-unit.target: 调用moveTo（ x ， y ）方法以在画布上的点（ x ， y ）处设置起始位置。

trans-unit.source: Call the connectToBackend() method to force the sensor to connect to a backend immediately. This is automatically called if you call start() so you only need to do this if you need access to sensor properties (ie. to poll the sensor's meta-data before you use it).
trans-unit.target: 调用connectToBackend（）方法以强制传感器立即连接到后端。如果您调用start（），则会自动调用此方法，因此仅在需要访问传感器属性（即在使用传感器之前先轮询传感器的元数据）时才需要执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: Call the context.beginPath() method to set the clipping path.
trans-unit.target: 调用 context.beginPath() 方法来设置剪切路径。

trans-unit.source: Call the context.clip() method.
trans-unit.target: 调用 context.clip() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the node's enableRemoting() function to share the source object.
trans-unit.target: 调用节点的enableRemoting（）函数以共享源对象。

trans-unit.source: Call the node's acquire() function to create a pointer to a replica.
trans-unit.target: 调用节点的acquire（）函数来创建一个指向副本的指针。

trans-unit.source: Call this function after you have installed a new translator with QCoreApplication::installTranslator, to ensure that your user-interface shows up-to-date translations.
trans-unit.target: 使用QCoreApplication :: installTranslator安装新的转换器后，请调用此函数，以确保您的用户界面显示最新的转换器。

trans-unit.source: Call this function during synchronize() to invalidate the current FBO. This will result in a new FBO being created with createFramebufferObject().
trans-unit.target: 在syncize（）期间调用此函数以使当前FBO无效。这将导致使用createFramebufferObject（）创建一个新的FBO 。

trans-unit.source: Call this function for sending the buffered data immediately to the serial port. The number of bytes successfully written depends on the operating system. In most cases, this function does not need to be called, because the QSerialPort class will start sending data automatically once control is returned to the event loop. In the absence of an event loop, call waitForBytesWritten() instead.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数可将缓冲的数据立即发送到串行端口。成功写入的字节数取决于操作系统。在大多数情况下，不需要调用此函数，因为一旦控制权返回事件循环，QSerialPort类将自动开始发送数据。在没有事件循环的情况下，请改为调用waitForBytesWritten（）。

trans-unit.source: Call this function if the sizeHint() or sizePolicy() have changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果sizeHint（）或sizePolicy（）已更改，则调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Call this function if the widget's sizeHint() has changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果小部件的sizeHint（）已更改，则调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Call this function if you need QAbstractSocket to start sending buffered data immediately. The number of bytes successfully written depends on the operating system. In most cases, you do not need to call this function, because QAbstractSocket will start sending data automatically once control goes back to the event loop. In the absence of an event loop, call waitForBytesWritten() instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要QAbstractSocket立即开始发送缓冲的数据，请调用此函数。成功写入的字节数取决于操作系统。在大多数情况下，您不需要调用此函数，因为一旦控制权返回事件循环，QAbstractSocket将自动开始发送数据。在没有事件循环的情况下，请改为调用waitForBytesWritten（）。

trans-unit.source: Call this function if you need QLocalSocket to start sending buffered data immediately. The number of bytes successfully written depends on the operating system. In most cases, you do not need to call this function, because QLocalSocket will start sending data automatically once control goes back to the event loop. In the absence of an event loop, call waitForBytesWritten() instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要QLocalSocket立即开始发送缓冲的数据，请调用此函数。成功写入的字节数取决于操作系统。在大多数情况下，您不需要调用此函数，因为一旦控制权返回事件循环，QLocalSocket将自动开始发送数据。在没有事件循环的情况下，请改为调用waitForBytesWritten（）。

trans-unit.source: Call this function if you need QSslSocket to start sending buffered data immediately. The number of bytes successfully written depends on the operating system. In most cases, you do not need to call this function, because QAbstractSocket will start sending data automatically once control goes back to the event loop. In the absence of an event loop, call waitForBytesWritten() instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要QSslSocket立即开始发送缓冲的数据，请调用此函数。成功写入的字节数取决于操作系统。在大多数情况下，您不需要调用此函数，因为一旦控制权返回事件循环，QAbstractSocket将自动开始发送数据。在没有事件循环的情况下，请改为调用waitForBytesWritten（）。

trans-unit.source: Call this function only if isValid() returns true, otherwise the behavior is undefined. This function takes (moves) the first result from the QFuture object, when only one result is expected. If there are any other results, they are discarded after taking the first one. If the result is not immediately available, this function will block and wait for the result to become available. The QFuture will try to use move semantics if possible, and will fall back to copy construction if the type is not movable. After the result was taken, isValid() will evaluate as false.
trans-unit.target: 仅当isValid（）返回 true 时，才调用此函数，否则该行为是不确定的。当仅期望一个结果时，此函数从QFuture对象获取（移动）第一个结果。如果还有其他结果，则取第一个结果后将其丢弃。如果结果不是立即可用，则此功能将阻止并等待结果变为可用。该QFuture如果可能，将尝试使用移动语义，并且将回退到拷贝构造，如果该类型是不可移动的。取得结果后，isValid（）的评估结果为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Call this function to bind this texture to the current texture target.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数将此纹理绑定到当前纹理目标上。

trans-unit.target: 调用此函数来关闭小组件。

trans-unit.source: Call this function to register the type T. T must be declared with Q_DECLARE_METATYPE(). Returns the meta type Id.

trans-unit.target: 调用此函数,请求允许更改属性。

trans-unit.target: 调用此函数重置OpenGL上下文的默认状态。

trans-unit.target: 调用此函数重置当前OpenGL上下文的默认状态。

trans-unit.source: Call this function to save memory, if you are not interested in the output of the process.
trans-unit.target: 如果你对进程的输出不感兴趣,可以调用这个函数来保存内存。

trans-unit.source: Call this function when examining the queues of a given Vulkan device, in order to decide which queue can be used for performing presentation.
trans-unit.target: 当检查给定Vulkan设备的队列时,调用该函数,以决定哪个队列可以用于执行演示。

trans-unit.source: Call this function when the FBO should be rendered again.
trans-unit.target: 当需要再次渲染FBO时,调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Call this function when there is a need to request a context for a given OpenGL version or profile. The sizes for depth, stencil and alpha buffers are taken care of automatically and there is no need to request those explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 当需要为给定的OpenGL版本或配置文件请求上下文时,调用此函数。深度、模板和alpha缓冲区的大小会自动处理,无需明确请求。

trans-unit.source: Call this function whenever the state of your accessible object or one of its sub-elements has been changed either programmatically (e.g. by calling QLabel::setText()) or by user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 只要可访问对象或其子元素之一的状态已通过编程方式更改（例如，通过调用QLabel :: setText（））或通过用户交互，便调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Call this method only when QSctpServer is in UnconnectedState.
trans-unit.target: 仅当QSctpServer处于UnconnectedState时才调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Calling push() returns the item that was pushed onto the stack. Calling pop() returns the item that was popped off the stack. When pop() is called in an unwind operation, the top-most item (the first item that was popped, which will also be the one transitioning out) is returned.

trans-unit.source: Calling a.setValue(12) makes a emit a valueChanged(12) signal, which b will receive in its setValue() slot, i.e. b.setValue(12) is called. Then b emits the same valueChanged() signal, but since no slot has been connected to b's valueChanged() signal, the signal is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 调用 a.setValue(12) ，使 a 发射 valueChanged(12) 信号，该信号 b 将获得其 setValue() 时隙，即 b.setValue(12) 被调用。然后 b 发出相同的 valueChanged() 信号，但是由于没有插槽连接到 b 的 valueChanged() 信号，因此该信号被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Calling call() can cause an exception to occur in the script engine; in that case, call() returns the value that was thrown (typically an Error object). You can call isError() on the return value to determine whether an exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 调用call（）可能导致脚本引擎中发生异常。在这种情况下，call（）返回所抛出的值（通常是一个 Error 对象）。您可以在返回值上调用isError（）以确定是否发生异常。

trans-unit.target: 调用cd（“ ..”）等效于调用cdUp（）。

trans-unit.source: Calling drawTiledPixmap() is similar to calling drawPixmap() several times to fill (tile) an area with a pixmap, but is potentially much more efficient depending on the underlying window system.
trans-unit.target: 调用drawTiledPixmap（）类似于多次调用drawPixmap（）以用像素图填充（平铺）区域，但根据基础窗口系统，其效率可能更高。

trans-unit.target: 在不活动的QPrinter对象上调用newPage（）总是会失败。

trans-unit.source: Calling normalize() on an element converts all its children into a standard form. This means that adjacent QDomText objects will be merged into a single text object (QDomCDATASection nodes are not merged).
trans-unit.target: 在元素上调用normalize（）会将其所有子元素转换为标准形式。这意味着相邻的QDomText对象将合并为单个文本对象（QDomCDATASection节点未合并）。

trans-unit.source: Calling parse() instead of process() can also be useful in order to ignore unknown options temporarily, because more option definitions will be provided later on (depending on one of the arguments), before calling process().
trans-unit.target: 为了暂时忽略未知选项，调用parse（）而不是process（）也很有用，因为稍后将在调用process（）之前（取决于参数之一）提供更多选项定义。

trans-unit.source: Calling qputenv with an empty value removes the environment variable on Windows, and makes it set (but empty) on Unix. Prefer using qunsetenv() for fully portable behavior.
trans-unit.target: 用空值调用qputenv会删除Windows上的环境变量，并使其在Unix上设置（但为空）。最好使用qunsetenv（）来实现完全可移植的行为。

trans-unit.source: Calling setVisible(false) or hide() hides a widget explicitly. An explicitly hidden widget will never become visible, even if all its ancestors become visible, unless you show it.
trans-unit.target: 调用setVisible（false）或hide（）会显式隐藏小部件。除非您显示它，否则即使它的所有祖先都可见，显式隐藏的窗口小部件也将永远不可见。

trans-unit.source: Calling setVisible(true) or show() sets the widget to visible status if all its parent widgets up to the window are visible. If an ancestor is not visible, the widget won't become visible until all its ancestors are shown. If its size or position has changed, Qt guarantees that a widget gets move and resize events just before it is shown. If the widget has not been resized yet, Qt will adjust the widget's size to a useful default using adjustSize().
trans-unit.target: 如果窗口的所有父窗口小部件都可见，则调用setVisible（true）或show（）会将窗口小部件设置为可见状态。如果祖先不可见，则在显示其所有祖先之前，该窗口小部件将不可见。如果其大小或位置已更改，则Qt保证窗口小部件在显示之前就获得移动和调整大小的事件。如果尚未调整窗口小部件的大小，Qt将使用adjustSize（）将窗口小部件的大小调整为有用的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function is typically the initial step when processing QModelIndex-based signals from a view, such as QAbstractItemView::activated(). In your slot, you call itemFromIndex(), with the QModelIndex carried by the signal as argument, to obtain a pointer to the corresponding QStandardItem.
trans-unit.target: 通常，从视图处理基于QModelIndex的信号（例如QAbstractItemView :: activated（））时，调用此函数是第一步。在您的插槽中，以信号携带的QModelIndex作为参数调用itemFromIndex（），以获得指向相应QStandardItem的指针。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function makes the subwindow enter the shaded mode. When the subwindow is shaded, only the title bar is visible.

trans-unit.source: Calling this function might result in the scene graph and the OpenGL context used for rendering being released to release graphics memory. If this happens, the sceneGraphInvalidated() signal will be called, allowing users to clean up their own graphics resources. The setPersistentOpenGLContext() and setPersistentSceneGraph() functions can be used to prevent this from happening, if handling the cleanup is not feasible in the application, at the cost of higher memory usage.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数可能会导致场景图和用于渲染的OpenGL上下文被释放以释放图形内存。如果发生这种情况，将调用sceneGraphInvalidated（）信号，使用户可以清理自己的图形资源。所述setPersistentOpenGLContext（）和setPersistentSceneGraph（）函数可以用来防止这种情况的发生，如果处理的清理是不可行的在应用程序中，在较高的内存使用情况的成本。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function only affects windows.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数仅影响Windows。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function processes events only for the calling thread, and returns after all available events have been processed. Available events are events queued before the function call. This means that events that are posted while the function runs will be queued until a later round of event processing.
trans-unit.target: 调用该函数只处理调用线程的事件,并在处理完所有可用事件后返回。可用事件是指在函数调用前排队的事件。这意味着在函数运行时发布的事件将被排队到后一轮事件处理中。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function processes events only for the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 调用该函数只处理调用线程的事件。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function re-evaluates the size and position of each visible row and column. This is needed if the functions assigned to rowHeightProvider or columnWidthProvider return different values than what is already assigned.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数将重新评估每个可见行和列的大小和位置。如果分配给rowHeightProvider或columnWidthProvider的函数返回的值与已分配的值不同，则需要这样做。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function requests the scene graph to release cached graphics resources, such as graphics pipeline objects or shader programs.
trans-unit.target: 调用该函数请求场景图释放缓存的图形资源,如图形管道对象或着色器程序。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function when the current container is not a map is also an error, though QCborStreamWriter cannot currently detect this condition.
trans-unit.target: 尽管QCborStreamWriter当前无法检测到这种情况，但在当前容器不是地图时调用此函数也是一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function when the current container is not an array is also an error, though QCborStreamWriter cannot currently detect this condition.
trans-unit.target: 尽管QCborStreamWriter当前无法检测到这种情况，但在当前容器不是数组时调用此函数也是一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function when there is no data available in the input source indicates to the reader that the end of the XML file has been reached. If the input supplied up to this point was not well-formed then a parsing error occurs, and false is returned. If the input supplied was well-formed, true is returned. It is important to end the input in this way because it allows you to reuse the reader to parse other XML files.
trans-unit.target: 当输入源中没有可用的数据时,调用这个函数,向读取者表明已经到达XML文件的终点。如果到此为止提供的输入没有很好地形成,那么就会发生一个解析错误,并返回false。如果提供的输入是格式良好的,则返回true。以这种方式结束输入是很重要的,因为它允许你重用阅读器来解析其他XML文件。

trans-unit.target: 调用此函数,其中

trans-unit.source: Calling this function will asynchronously yield either a productRegistered() or a productUnknown() signal. It may also yield a transactionReady() signal if there is a pending transaction for the product which has not yet been finalized.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数将异步产生productRegistered（）或productUnknown（）信号。如果该产品存在尚未完成的待处理事务，它也可能会产生transactionReady（）信号。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function will hide the widget. You must call show() to make the widget visible again.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数将隐藏小部件。您必须调用show（）才能使小部件再次可见。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function will override the url of the containing component used by default.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数将覆盖默认使用的包含组件的url。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function with
trans-unit.target: 在调用这个函数时,用

trans-unit.source: Calling this function with Qt::DeviceCoordinates outside of QGraphicsEffect::draw() will give undefined results, as there is no device context available.
trans-unit.target: 使用QGraphicsEffect :: draw（）之外的Qt :: DeviceCoordinates调用此函数将产生未定义的结果，因为没有可用的设备上下文。

trans-unit.source: Calling this has no effect when a graphics API other than OpenGL is used, but is highly beneficial when the API is OpenGL as it will lead to creating an OpenGL context that is best suited for Qt Quick 3D's needs.
trans-unit.target: 当使用OpenGL以外的图形API时,调用此功能没有任何效果,但当API是OpenGL时,调用此功能是非常有利的,因为它将导致创建一个最适合Qt Quick 3D需求的OpenGL上下文。

trans-unit.source: Calling this is not recommended when protecting a short-lived operation: QLockFile already takes care of removing lock files after they are older than staleLockTime().
trans-unit.target: 保护短命操作时，不建议调用此方法：QLockFile已经负责删除比staleLockTime（）更旧的锁定文件。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method can be rather expensive if rotations or shearing are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用旋转或剪切,调用这种方法会相当昂贵。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method forces the backend to trigger a routes recalculation.
trans-unit.target: 调用该方法会强制后台触发路由重新计算。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method multiple times with the same URL will result in the QML component being reinstantiated.
trans-unit.target: 用相同的URL多次调用该方法将导致QML组件被重新建立。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method multiple times with the same url will result in the QML component being reinstantiated.
trans-unit.target: 用相同的url多次调用该方法将导致QML组件被重新实例化。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will cause onPurchaseRestored handlers to be called asynchronously on previously purchased unlockable products. This can be used to restore purchases for unlockable products when the application is run by the same user on multiple devices, or for example if the application has been uninstalled and reinstalled on the device so that the purchase data has been lost.
trans-unit.target: 调用该方法将导致对先前购买的可解锁产品异步调用onPurchaseRestored处理程序。当应用程序由同一用户在多个设备上运行时,或例如当应用程序被卸载后又重新安装到设备上导致购买数据丢失时,可以使用该方法来恢复可解锁产品的购买。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will update the corresponding moving and flicking properties and signals, just like a real flick.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法将更新相应的移动和闪动属性和信号,就像真正的闪动一样。

trans-unit.source: Calling this while the camera is active may result in the camera being stopped and reloaded. If video recording is in progress, this call may be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在摄像机处于活动状态时调用此功能可能会导致摄像机停止并重新加载。如果正在进行视频录制,则可能会忽略此呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Calling this will start an interactive move operation on the window by platforms that support it. The actual behavior may vary depending on the platform. Usually, it will make the window follow the mouse cursor until a mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: 调用该功能,将由支持该功能的平台开始对窗口进行交互式移动操作。实际行为可能因平台不同而不同。通常情况下,它会使窗口跟随鼠标光标移动,直到释放鼠标按钮。

trans-unit.source: Calling this will start an interactive resize operation on the window by platforms that support it. The actual behavior may vary depending on the platform. Usually, it will make the window resize so that its edge follows the mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: 调用此功能将启动支持该功能的平台对窗口进行交互式调整大小的操作。实际行为可能会因平台不同而不同。通常,它将使窗口调整大小,使其边缘跟随鼠标光标。

trans-unit.source: Calling unlock() without locking the file first, does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 在没有先锁定文件的情况下调用unlock(),没有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Calling update() several times normally results in just one paintEvent() call.
trans-unit.target: 多次调用update（）通常只会导致一次paintEvent（）调用。

trans-unit.source: Calls QSensorGestureRecognizer::create() if the recognizer is valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器有效，则调用QSensorGestureRecognizer :: create（）。

trans-unit.source: Calls QSensorGestureRecognizer::stop() if no other clients are using it. This is called by the QSensorGesture object, so please use that instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有其他客户端正在使用QSensorGestureRecognizer :: stop（），则调用它。这由QSensorGesture对象调用，因此请改用它。

trans-unit.source: Calls are usually placed by using the call() function, which constructs the message, sends it over the bus, waits for the reply and decodes the reply. Signals are connected to by using the normal QObject::connect() function. Finally, properties are accessed using the QObject::property() and QObject::setProperty() functions.
trans-unit.target: 通常通过使用call（）函数来放置呼叫，该函数构造消息，通过总线发送消息，等待答复并解码答复。通过使用常规的QObject :: connect（）函数将信号连接到。最后，使用QObject :: property（）和QObject :: setProperty（）函数访问属性。

trans-unit.source: Calls are usually placed by using the call() function, which constructs the message, sends it over the bus, waits for the reply and decodes the reply. Signals are connected to by using the normal QObject::connect() function. Finally, properties are accessed using the QObject::property() and QObject::setProperty() functions.
trans-unit.target: 通常通过使用call（）函数来放置呼叫，该函数构造消息，通过总线发送消息，等待答复并解码答复。通过使用普通的QObject :: connect（）函数将信号连接到。最后，使用QObject :: property（）和QObject :: setProperty（）函数访问属性。

trans-unit.source: Camera (QML type)
trans-unit.target: 摄像机(QML型)

trans-unit.source: Camera Example
trans-unit.target: 摄像机实例

trans-unit.source: Camera ISO sensitivity, specified as integer value.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机ISO感光度,指定为整数值。

trans-unit.source: Camera Overview
trans-unit.target: 摄像机概述

trans-unit.source: Camera QML Type
trans-unit.target: 摄像机QML类型

trans-unit.source: Camera exposure mode.
trans-unit.target: 相机曝光模式。

trans-unit.source: Camera field of view is horizontal, i.e. aspect ratio is adjusted horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机的视场是水平的,即水平调整长宽比。

trans-unit.source: Camera field of view is vertical, i.e. aspect ratio is adjusted vertically. This is the default orientation.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机的视场是垂直的,即纵横比是垂直调整的。这是默认的方向。

trans-unit.source: Camera is configured for still frames capture.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机配置为静止帧捕捉。

trans-unit.source: Camera is configured for video capture.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机配置为视频采集。

trans-unit.source: Camera is only configured to display viewfinder.
trans-unit.target: 相机仅配置为显示取景器。

trans-unit.source: Camera metering mode.
trans-unit.target: 相机测光模式。

trans-unit.source: Camera saves all the capture parameters like exposure settings or image processing parameters, so changes to camera parameters after capture() is called do not affect previous capture requests.
trans-unit.target: 相机会保存所有的捕捉参数,如曝光设置或图像处理参数,因此在调用capture()后对相机参数的更改不会影响之前的捕捉请求。

trans-unit.source: Camera service may choose the parameters of image processing pipeline depending on sensor properties camera settings and capture parameters.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机服务可以根据传感器属性摄像机设置和采集参数来选择图像处理流水线的参数。

trans-unit.source: Camera specified in the exposed camera property
trans-unit.target: 在暴露的摄像机属性中指定的摄像机

trans-unit.source: Camera's shutter speed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 相机的快门速度(秒)。

trans-unit.source: Camera3D represents a basic orbit around centerpoint 3D camera that is used when rendering the data visualization. The type offers simple methods for rotating the camera around the origin and setting zoom level.
trans-unit.target: Camera3D表示一个基本的围绕中心点的3D摄像机,在渲染数据可视化时使用。该类型提供了简单的方法,用于围绕原点旋转相机和设置缩放级别。
